text: Gidaadou e iloo bolo nia haganoho la hagalee ne hai ang gi digau humalia, gei ne hai ang gi digau dagadagahi haganoho ge e hai nia mee huaidu, ge hagalee mmaadagu i God, digau o di bouli, digau hagalee daumaha, digau ala e daaligi nadau damana mo nadau dinana gii mmade, digau daaligi dangada,
